answers.answer: My daughter weight 7 at 34 weeks I delivered her natural at 38 weeks a healthy 10 pounds.
Did you have an epidural or was it all natural?
I had an epidermal due to her size. But I also had diabetes so she grew at a fast rate.
They told me I didn't have them when I got my glucose test done, but I had to switch drs and had to redo it. I'm wondering if that's why she's so big already though?
It could be but I'm pregnant with my second and my diabetes is tightly controlled and my daughter was estimated to weigh 6 lb 3 Oz at 32 weeks. Some women are just blessed to make bigger babies.
I had an ultrasound at 33 wks 4 days an my son weighed 5 lb 9 oz but I have to have a c section I'm just hoping he doesn't get to big cause I don't want them to have to make a bigger incision
Im 34 weeks and my baby weighs 4lbs 13oz i too have diabetes. Does this mean im having a small baby? This is my first pregnancy.
Could be. It's all how the baby grows. Some babies even out.
I had an ultrasound at 35 weeks and they said my baby was 6 lbs 14 oz.  But usually the weight can be a pound off the actual one

question: I'm 34 weeks and 4 days and at my last appointment my Dr told me by baby was about 6 pounds. Has anyone else had a baby close to this around this time, and how did labor go? I don't want a c-section if I don't have to have one. And I don't see how she could be that big when I've only gained 19 pounds this who time. Any suggestions or anything, this is my first time pregnant and I'm a little lost.
title: 34wks & 4ds 6lb baby
